scripts.emit:react: tsc --project ./tsconfig.react.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./react && cp react/*.d.ts react/esm && cp react/flags/*.d.ts react/esm/flags
scripts.emit:react-native: tsc --project ./tsconfig.react-native.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./react-native && cp react-native/*.d.ts react-native/esm && cp react-native/flags/*.d.ts react-native/esm/flags
scripts.compile: node compile.js && yarn emit:react && yarn emit:react-native
scripts.build:regen: yarn fetch && yarn gen && yarn compile && yarn cleanup
